title: bdi
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The HTML <bdi> element isolates a span of text that might be formatted in a different direction from other text outside it.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.code: Here is some text in English العربية and more text in English.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/p
	Here is some text in English 
	/bdi @dir="rtl"
		العربية
	 and more text in English.
